name: Spinnies
description:
Spinnies is an addictive game that will test your reflexes!

Touch the screen when your Spinnie hits the target. Easy, right? Well, give it a try and challenge your friends!

Beat your score to unlock new Spinnies. The higher you score, the cuter they get!

Log on to Google Play Games and unlock achievements as you progress in the game! Get on the All-Time Leaderboard to see where you rank among the world's best Spinnies!
